# Known Invalid Files in Official HDF5 Test Suite
#
# This file lists HDF5 test files that are known to be invalid or
# intentionally corrupted for edge case testing. These files are
# expected to fail validation and are skipped during test suite runs.
#
# Format:
# - One filename per line
# - Lines starting with # are comments
# - Empty lines are ignored
#
# Last Updated: 2025-01-27

# ===================================================
# Family File Format (Multi-File HDF5)
# ===================================================
# These files use the HDF5 "family" file driver which splits a single
# logical HDF5 file across multiple physical files. This is not a
# single-file format and requires special driver support.
# Status: Not supported (deferred to v0.13.0+)

family_file00001.h5
family_file00002.h5
family_file00003.h5
family_file00004.h5
family_file00005.h5
family_file00006.h5
family_file00007.h5
family_file00008.h5
family_file00009.h5
family_file00010.h5
family_file00011.h5
family_file00012.h5
family_file00013.h5
family_file00014.h5
family_file00015.h5
family_file00016.h5
family_file00017.h5
family_v16-000001.h5
family_v16-000002.h5
family_v16-000003.h5
tfamily00000.h5
tfamily00001.h5
tfamily00002.h5
tfamily00003.h5
tfamily00004.h5
tfamily00005.h5
tfamily00006.h5
tfamily00007.h5
tfamily00008.h5
tfamily00009.h5
tfamily00010.h5

# ===================================================
# Multi-File Format (Split Driver)
# ===================================================
# These files use the HDF5 "multi" or "split" file driver which splits
# metadata and raw data into separate files.
# Status: Not supported (deferred to v0.13.0+)

tmulti-b.h5
tmulti-g.h5
tmulti-l.h5
tmulti-o.h5
tmulti-r.h5
tmulti-s.h5
tsplit_file-r.h5
multi_file_v16-r.h5

# ===================================================
# Superblock Version 1 (Legacy Format)
# ===================================================
# Our library supports superblock versions 0, 2, and 3.
# Version 1 is rare and deferred to future releases.
# Status: Not supported (deferred to v0.13.0+)

old_h5fc_ext1_i.h5

# ===================================================
# ===================================================
# Truly Corrupted Files (8 files)
# ===================================================
# These files are corrupted or have intentionally invalid structures.
# The C library h5dump/h5ls also fails on these files.
# Status: Expected to fail (proper error handling)

3790_infinite_loop.h5
bad_offset.h5
corrupt_stab_msg.h5
h5clear_fsm_persist_noclose.h5
h5clear_fsm_persist_user_greater.h5
h5clear_status_noclose.h5
test_subfiling_precreate_rank_0.h5
test_subfiling_stripe_sizes.h5

# ===================================================
# Unsupported Features (7 files) - Valid HDF5!
# ===================================================
# These are VALID HDF5 files that the C library reads successfully.
# We skip them because they use features not yet implemented.
# Status: Deferred to v0.13.0+ (user blocks, SOHM, etc.)

h5clear_fsm_persist_user_equal.h5
h5clear_fsm_persist_user_less.h5
h5clear_mdc_image.h5
h5stat_tsohm.h5
tsizeslheap.h5
twithub.h5
twithub513.h5
